name: unscriptural
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not from or relating to the holy writings of a religion: They were concerned about a creeping acceptance of unscriptural practices. He believed that this was a hideous and unscriptural doctrine. Related word
scriptureOpposite
scriptural
More examplesFewer examplesSome of them embraced unscriptural views.Other theologians call it an unscriptural or occult practice.She said that misquoting scripture is an efficient means of conveying unscriptural views.Whether a doctrine is scriptural or unscriptural, it still divides.The sooner this notion is shown to be unscriptural, the better. Such a conclusion would be distinctly unscriptural.It is quite unscriptural to say this.
